rgh-console(script)# help digest
Digest data using classic hash algorithms

Usage: digest <COMMAND>

Commands:
  string  Hash a provided string
  file    Hash the contents of a file or directory
  stdio   Hash newline-delimited stdin input
  help    Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

Options:
  -h, --help
          Print help

  -V, --version
          Print version

rgh-console(script)# help kdf hkdf
Derive key material using HKDF (RFC 5869)

Usage: hkdf [OPTIONS] --len <len>

Options:
      --ikm <HEX>
          Hex-encoded input keying material (omit when using --ikm-stdin)

      --ikm-stdin
          Read input keying material from stdin

      --expand-only
          Skip extract phase and expand using supplied PRK

      --prk <PATH>
          Read PRK bytes from file for expand-only mode

      --prk-stdin
          Read PRK bytes from stdin for expand-only mode

      --salt <HEX>
          Optional hex-encoded salt (defaults to empty; ignored for expand-only)

      --info <HEX>
          Optional hex-encoded context info

      --len <len>
          Desired derived length in bytes

      --hash <hash>
          Digest variant for HKDF
          
          [default: sha256]
          [possible values: sha256, sha512, sha3-256, sha3-512, blake3]

      --hash-only
          Emit only the derived key hex output

  -h, --help
          Print help

  -V, --version
          Print version

Provide either --ikm <HEX> or --ikm-stdin for extract+expand flows. For expand-only use --expand-only with --prk <PATH> or --prk-stdin.
